name: M4Y&H3M
description:
You ever wondered what a casual guy just getting home from prison does with his time?

OH YEA opens a cafe with robo-waitresses ! 

In an alternative universe of the close close future

Explore the world and story of young man trying to just pay his bills after getting from prison... 

As his hopes keep sinking and his dream of opening a little cafe seem almost impossible SURPRISE SURPRISE!
